column2:
"Oh dear, oh dear! It seems that D-arkers
are also collecting the precious stones
at the Ruins!"

"I heard that if D-arker holds the stone,
its colour will change! That'll be the end
of the precious stone!"

"Here's my request to you!
Please snatch the stones back from the
D-arkers!"

"大変、大変だよっ！
遺跡の貴重な玉石を、ダーカーも
集めているみたいなの！"

"ダーカーが持っちゃうと、玉石が
変色しちゃうんだって！
貴重な玉石がダメになっちゃうよー！"

"どうかお願い！
ダーカーから玉石を取り戻して！"
